titles.title: To impose a retroactive, 2-year moratorium on inclusion of unemployment compensation in gross income.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/11/2003--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to impose a retroactive, two-year moratorium on inclusion of unemployment compensation in gross income, for taxable years 2002 and 2003.
